Wow the moment I seen this dress, I immediately knew that my 5yo would love this dress and it was also perfect for her sneaker ball they had at the school! She got so so many compliments on her dress 💖  definitely a great buy!
This fits well and looks adorable on my daughter

评论概述: Beautiful, Comfortable and True to Size!
评论详情: My 11 year old wore this dress in a size 10/12 and it fit perfectly.  The fabric has just enough stretch to make movement comfortable and prevent complaining.  It made for a fantastic flapper costume and will also be a beautiful holiday dress.  It's well made and very sparkly.

My daughter absolutely loves this dress.  We thought it would be short lived with all the danglies but so far it's held up great, and she wears it to kindergarten about once a week and it normally just ends up in the normal wash.  She typically wears leggings underneath it because she likes to.  I thought that it would be itchy but she hasn't complained about that at all.  From the playground to the runway, this is a great dress.  We've ordered quite a few things from Grace Karin and all their products have been awesome.

Price: $31.98 This is a modest but fun flapper dress. It was used for a costume party. It fits a petite 13 year old well. It was a bit snug but not tight. It was made well enough for a costume and can be worn again.

Purchased this dress for my daughter's Halloween costume.  She wants to be a dragon from Wings of Fire. PERFECT! Such a stylish and classic piece to add to my daughter's closet but perfect for a colorful dragon costume.  Highly recommend
This dress is stunning! We are using it for a Gatsby party.
This is so cute and fun! My daughter is going to wear it for decades day at her school. It fit true to size. The inside of the dress was non itchy (very important).
This dress is excellent quality. Made so well. The fabric is gorgeous. True to sizing chart. She loved wearing it and said it was so comfortable. Great price for the excellent quality.

I love the Grace Karin brand, and you can find me on a lot of their reviews, because so do my daughters! The quality is better than some department stores and they have so many cute styles and options. I got this for one of my daughters to wear at Christmas time. I picked the red and she picked the fringe dress. It will look so cute on her and both my girls will love that their dresses are different but coordinate.

评论概述: Gorgeous Flapper Dress – Perfect for Special Occasions
评论详情: This fancy dress is absolutely stunning! The black multicolor sequins and fringe give it a fun, vintage flapper vibe, perfect for themed parties or formal events. My daughter felt so glamorous wearing it, and the matching hairbow was the perfect accessory to complete the look.  The dress fits true to size and is comfortable enough for her to wear for hours. The fringe detailing moves beautifully when she dances, and the sequins catch the light, making the dress sparkle from every angle. It’s definitely a show-stopper and she received so many compliments at her event!  What really impressed me is the quality of the dress. The sequins are securely attached, and the fabric is soft and well-made, ensuring comfort and durability even after a full day of wear. The dress held up perfectly, and I can tell it will last for many more special occasions.  Overall, this dress is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a fancy, fun dress for their little one. It’s beautifully designed, well-made, and sure to make any girl feel special. Highly recommend!

Were having a roaring 20s bash for Halloween, and this is perfect for my daughter! It catches the light with each movement, and provides perfect coverage! The flapper tassels move with ease, much to her delight. Fits well, and she says it's really comfortable! Quality made, definitely worth it!
Very sparkling, fits as expected,  soft and comfortable

I bought this dress (size 6-7) for my 5 year old who wears a 7/8, I wanted it to be fitted. It is absolutely gorgeous!!!!! The quality is great, not itchy. Has a zipper on the back making is easy to put on/off. This dress is a MUST!

I got this for my daughter and she was very happy to wear it but after a few hours she was complaining of her legs being itchy, when we looked we noticed a bunch of scratches on her thighs from the sequins. She will probably have to wear leggings with this to protect her skin, otherwise it’s a cute dress. It fits very loose, it looks like a flapper dress so great for costumes, if you have kids with sensory concerns this may not be the best fit.

Out of all the random brands on Amazon these days, Grace Karin is one I have bought from DOZENS of times over the years and has become a name I know I can trust. This dress is no exception! It is fabulous quality, well made, all seams finished, no shedding sequins. My 5yo niece screamed when she opened this dress and has been wearing it nonstop. The fit is accurate to the size chart; I ordered the next larger size so that she could wear it for longer. The color is accurate to the product images. Highly recommend this dress and this brand!
Fit perfectly and to cute
I love this dress it's fit my daughter very well The fabric is good and pleasant, the design is so cute

This GRACE KARIN Sequin Flapper Dress is a showstopper for any little fashionista! I got this for my daughter, and she absolutely loves it. The fit is perfect—dress code-friendly and just right for her age, which is such a relief. The sequins are securely attached, so I don’t have to worry about a trail of glitter everywhere she goes.  The zipper is sturdy and smooth, which isn’t always the case with dresses like this. Bonus points for the matching hair tie with a sequined bow! It’s those little touches that make it feel extra special.  Overall, this dress hits the mark on quality, style, and appropriateness. My daughter is already asking to wear it to the next party. 🌟

评论概述: Well made, no fraying even after being worn nonstop
评论详情: My 5 year old loves sequin dresses, and this is the first time I've bought one that didn't instantly start to fray. I bought it way bigger than she needed, because I know that she will wear it until there is no dress left. When I gave this one to her, she grabbed it and ran around the house screaming with delight then immediately after had to put it on. Since that moment she had refused to take it off because it makes her "look like a princess." Made great, amazing look, and worth the price.
